name: Aspect of Hatred
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Aura of Rage
traits.desc: Living creatures within 30 feet of the aspect are filled with a blinding rage. The first weapon attack each turn made by a creature within this aura is made with disadvantage. This effect ends when the aspect is reduced to 0 hit points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The aspect is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The aspect has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The aspect's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aspect makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wave of Rage (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each hostile creature within 30 feet of the aspect must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become filled with an insatiable bloodlust for one minute. Any creature that failed the save must take the attack action on each of its turns and cannot use its bonus action. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
